MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G62 and G63 area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Milndavie Road and surrounding areas. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to repair a grounded overhead electricity line near Lower Craigallian affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible. Once we receive information from them we will update this message to let you know when the power will be restored. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:01 PM on Sunday, 07 March 2021.
